document_data.name: House Everet
document_data.mainbody:
'''Everet''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]] based in [[Marsember]].{{Cite dungeon/113/Practical Magic}}

Though once a proud family, the Everets declined over a number of generations. By the 1370s [[DR]], [[Delthrin Everet]] was the last remaining member.
